publisher.value: HL7 International - Biomedical Research and Regulation Work Group

description.value: The PCORNet VX Status Reason contains the codes to be used by PCORNet data marts.

definition.value: Reason immunization is incomplete or not done is due to Immunity.
Reason immunization is incomplete or not done is due to Medical precaution.
Reason immunization is incomplete or not done is due to Out of stock.
Reason immunization is incomplete or not done is due to Patient objection.
Reason immunization is incomplete or not done is due to No Information.
Reason immunization is incomplete or not done is due to Unknown.
Reason immunization is incomplete or not done is due to Other.
